amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to enforce the economic embargo of Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add provisions to the bill prohibiting funds from being used to implement Public Law 104-114 which codifies the economic embargo of Cuba, as in effect on March 1, 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rangel amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 241 (Roll no. 424).
